name: Vulture Strike
description: Vulture Strike is a side-scrolling shooting game in which you have the ability to travel between 2 parallel timelines whenever you want.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel i3, 3.1GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 6770 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: AMD a8, 3.6GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon R7 260 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
